text:
F. H. LaGUARDIA, May ox
M. S. NOVIK, Director
ADDRESS ALL.
COMMUNICATIONS
TO THE DIRECTOR
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
And
Stations
August 29th, 1941
WASJ
WKDX
WEHA
W2XVP
WNYK
WNYL
WNYN
WNYO
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
WILL
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Frank:
I am planning to attend the conference
at Purdue and in checking through on the plane and railroad
service, I‘ve found that the plane I would like to take
(arriving Indianapolis 8:40 p.m.) means a wait-over in
Indianapolis until 12:10 a.m. Do you know of anyone who
is driving through that I might join, or of any other
connection that would be better? I am planning to leave
Thursday, September 4th.
MSN:c
NEW YORK
WORLD'S FAIR 1940
2SI
‘New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
